title: Application Review Process
description: Learn how to review and process loan applications efficiently

steps.title: Applications List
steps.description: This is your main workspace for reviewing applications. Each card shows key information at a glance including business name, loan amount, and current status.

steps.title: Filter and Search
steps.description: Use filters to narrow down applications by status, date range, or loan amount. The search bar helps you find specific businesses quickly.

steps.title: Application Status
steps.description: Status badges provide quick visual indicators: Draft (gray), Submitted (blue), Under Review (yellow), Approved (green), or Rejected (red).

steps.title: Application Card
steps.description: Each card displays essential information: business name, loan amount, submission date, and current status. Click any card to view full details.

steps.title: Application Details View
steps.description: The detail view shows comprehensive information about the application including business details, financial information, and supporting documents.

steps.title: Business Information
steps.description: Review key business details including name, industry, years in operation, and contact information. Verify this information matches supporting documents.

steps.title: Financial Information
steps.description: Examine the requested loan amount, purpose, and financial projections. This section is crucial for assessing the application's viability.

steps.title: Supporting Documents
steps.description: Review all uploaded documents including tax returns, bank statements, and business licenses. Click any document to view or download it.

steps.title: AI-Powered Insights
steps.description: View AI-generated risk scores, document analysis, and recommendations. These insights help you make informed decisions faster.

steps.title: Review Timeline
steps.description: Track the application's journey through the review process. See who reviewed it, when actions were taken, and any comments added.

steps.title: Review Actions
steps.description: Use these buttons to approve, reject, or request more information. You can also add comments or assign the application to another reviewer.

steps.title: Review Process Complete!
steps.description: You now know how to efficiently review applications. Try the AI Features walkthrough to learn about intelligent document analysis and risk assessment.
